title: [買唔到樓請反省] Bitcoin升穿2,200美金 七年用100元變500萬！

replies.msg:
比特幣Bitcoin連續兩日破頂，今早Bitcoin再單日升100美元，最高見2,251美元，最新報2,182美元，再創歷史新高。

Bitcoin於2009年首次推出時，價值只得0.008美分，到2010年5月首次公開交易後，價值為0.03美元，折合約0.234港元，買3個bitcoin亦不足1元港幣，若當時用100元買入300個bitcoin，現時已價值500萬元，回報率高達5萬倍。

http://hkm.appledaily.com/detail.php?guid=56729489&category_guid=7015342&category=instant&issue=20170523

https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-05-22/peach-becomes-japan-s-first-airline-to-accept-payment-in-bitcoin
Peach Becomes Japan's First Airline to Accept Payment in Bitcoin
by Chris Cooper and Kiyotaka Matsuda
May 22, 2017, 3:45 PM GMT+8

Peach Aviation Ltd. will become the first Japanese carrier to accept bitcoin as payment for airline tickets as the discount airline aims to attract more tourists from other parts of Asia.

The cryptocurrency can be used to book seats starting by the end of the year, Peach said in a statement in Tokyo Monday, adding a change in Japan’s law on fund settlements in April helped facilitate the move. The carrier also aims to increase tie-ups with local governments and regional companies to help spread usage of the currency, it said.

“We want to encourage visitors from overseas and the revitalization of Japan’s regions,” Shinichi Inoue, chief executive officer of Peach told reporters in Tokyo Monday. “This is a real first step in partnerships for Japan and we are aiming for more company and service tie-ups.”

Bitcoin is surging in popularity as the digital payment system that allows users anywhere in the world to transact directly without interference from intermediaries, governments, regulators or central banks. Latvian airline airBaltic announced almost three years ago that it would start accepting payment using bitcoin as it focuses on the customer.

比特幣可以分割的， 因為佢係數碼貨幣
簡單來講bitcoin 有2100萬個係指bitcoin基本單位，原始單位

比如A 採礦得出有1 coin
當B 向A 買入0.5 coin 時
B 的transaction 連埋佢條hash key 就會加入這個coin 上， 所以呢個coin 就會有以下既歷史記錄

owner:A amount:1 > [owner:A amount:0.5, owner:B amount:0.5]

這條交易記錄鏈就是區塊鏈 blockchain

理論上一單位bitcoin 可以分割成0.00000001。也就是說bitcoin 的最終可以分割成2.1 × 10^15個單位

也就是說成條區塊鏈可以知道由bitcoin 出世到而家所有交流記錄， 同這一個coin 的ownership...
所以如果你拿個bitcoin 出來， 沿住blockchain 尾...一個個交易數到頭， 你應該會知道而家有幾個人擁有呢個coin, 每人有幾多unit, 而佢地之前向邊個買...當然所有分割左既單位加埋一定等於1

簡單來講bitcoin 有2100萬個係指bitcoin基本單位，原始單位

比如A 採礦得出有1 coin
當B 向A 買入0.5 coin 時
B 的transaction 連埋佢條hash key 就會加入這個coin 上， 所以呢個coin 就會有以下既歷史記錄

owner:A amount:1 > [owner:A amount:0.5, owner:B amount:0.5]

這條交易記錄鏈就是區塊鏈 blockchain

理論上一單位bitcoin 可以分割成0.00000001。也就是說bitcoin 的最終可以分割成2.1 × 10^15個單位

1.
是的區塊鏈長度增長速度非常快， 這也是blockchain 技術最大的技術難題，要非常巨大的運算力才可以合理時間完成一條blockchain 的計算...但係亦由於咁樣， blockchain 記錄係好安全，因為黑客要係快於全球一半主機得到結果前完成blockchain 的解密同刪改， 理論上無可能

以下是blocks - size 增長
https://blockchain.info/charts/blocks-size

2. 太detail 唔講， 對於這個coin 的擁有權係A, B 各佔一伴，因為根據佢blockchain 最尾的block, 已經計到所有份額（加埋為1) , 當然blockchain 越長就計算得越耐。

每個用戶A, B 都有代表佢自己身份簽名（hash key), 那麼交易所可以利用這個hash 去找出相關不同coin 有這個hash 的 block, 然後計算你現在擁有既所有分數...

又或者計算晒所有現存的bitcoin 然後就得到這一刻所有owner 同佢地total 既分數...當然這是全球幾百萬台機一齊計， 然後結果不斷分發出去...

龐氏騙局指責[編輯]
比特幣曾經被指控為「龐氏騙局」，因為比特幣的匯率在不斷地上漲，而早期的比特幣用戶挖礦較為容易。[99][100]經過長期的討論，一般都不認可這一指控。例如，歐洲中央銀行對這一虛擬貨幣進行仔細認真地研究後，在分析報告中否定了比特幣是龐氏騙局的指控。[101]

我預期，bitcoin如果繼續升值，升到某個階段可能因為大家strong hold而出現不可預料的情況。

但bitcoin 唔係可以分割咩？


係可以，但這唔能夠影響人的心理。

我預期，bitcoin如果繼續升值，升到某個階段可能因為大家strong hold而出現不可預料的情況。

# of Bitcoins currently in circulation: Roughly 16,350,000

Current Bitcoin price vs. the USD: Roughly $2500

1,000 bitcoins represents roughly 0.006% of the total number of Bitcoins that exist

Average drop in Bitcoin price from selloff of just 1,000 bitcoins: $30 (see raw data of price moves at Bitcoincharts.com)

Estimated drop in Bitcoin price that would occur from the sale of 10,000 bitcoins (just 0.06% of the Bitcoin supply): $300

Estimated drop in Bitcoin price from sale of 100,000 bitcoins (just 0.6% of the Bitcoin supply): $3000 (but wait, Bitcoin is only worth $2,500, so wouldn’t a selloff of 100,000 Bitcoins plunge the price toward zero? YES, it would.)

Value of Bitcoin if just 1% of current Bitcoin owners try to sell all their Bitcoins: Approaching $ZERO

What percentage of current Bitcoin owners think ALL their Bitcoins are worth the current high price: 100%

Actual percentage of current Bitcoin owners who can unload Bitcoins without crashing Bitcoin values toward zero: Perhaps 1% – 2%
(and that’s generous)

Percentage of current Bitcoin owners who are going to learn a very expensive lesson in “tulip bulb mania”: Perhaps 98% – 99%
